Flávia da Rosa Silveira

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/3365795697291231
  • Última atualização do currículo em 22/04/2019

Nutritionist at the University of Extremo Sul Catarinense (UNESC) -2014. Worked as a fellow in Scientific Initiation at the Neurosciences Laboratory of the same university, with emphasis in the area of ​​schizophrenia. Experience with treatments in rats, folic acid, omega 3, cannabidiol, postgraduate in nutrition in school feeding (UCAMPROMINAS) -2017. Master's Degree in Federal Institute of Rio Grande do Sul - Professional Master's Degree in Professional and Technological Education in National Network - PROFEPT. He is currently a Nutritionist at the Federal Catarinense Institute - IFC - Campus Santa Rosa do Sul-SC (Texto informado pelo autor)
